messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 2013/08/03 07:06:26, mikio wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go

I see a test failure on my machine

lucky(~/go/src/pkg/net) % go test 
--- FAIL: TestUnixAutobind (0.00 seconds)
        unix_test.go:125: invalid autobind address: @
FAIL
exit status 1
FAIL    net     20.684s

a bit early, pls take a look at 12023043 first.
this cl will be merged into the after the next but two.

On Sat, Aug 3, 2013 at 6:30 PM,  <dave@cheney.net> wrote:
> On 2013/08/03 07:06:26, mikio wrote:
>>
>> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc:
>
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
>
>> I'd like you to review this change to
>> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> I see a test failure on my machine
>
> lucky(~/go/src/pkg/net) % go test
> --- FAIL: TestUnixAutobind (0.00 seconds)
>         unix_test.go:125: invalid autobind address: @
> FAIL
> exit status 1
> FAIL    net     20.684s
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12402043/

subject: code review 12402043: net: simplify sockaddr of UnixAddr
